dmca.title: Net Result C & D Notice
dmca.body:
>NetResult Internal Reference:  UK1906_FKU_CSTOKES
>>
>> Please quote the above reference number in all communications with us
>> regarding this issue.
>>
>> Dear Sirs
>>
>> I represent NetResult (http://www.nr-online.com) based in London.  One of
>> our clients has raised a concern regarding graphical elements displayed

within

>> your companies' website.
>>
>> As you have neither sought nor obtained permission from our client to use
>> this content, your present use is an infringement of our clients' rights.
>>
>> Please can you contact me immediately as a matter or urgency in order that
>> I can furnish you with all the relevant information on what alterations

are

>> required.  I am available day or night 7 days per week and you are welcome

to

>> contact me on any of the numbers offered below.
>>
>> Nothing in this letter is intended or shall be construed to constitute an
>> express or implied waiver of any of our clients' rights or remedies,

whether

>> current or in the future, all of which are expressly reserved.
>>
>> If I do not hear from you within the next 5 working days, we shall assume
>> that you have decided to ignore this notice and begin proceedings against

you

>> within the full remit of the laws of the United Kingdom.
>>
>> I, Christopher Stokes, as a representative of NetResult hereby digitally
>> sign this e-mail message under penalty of perjury with the additional

statement

>> under penalty of perjury that the information in the notice is accurate.
>>
>> Yours sincerely,
>>
[private]
